hooks.command: case "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH" in *.env|*.env.*) echo 'BLOCKED: Cannot edit .env files — manage secrets via Vercel env vars' >&2; exit 2;; esac
case "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH" in */package-lock.json|*/pnpm-lock.yaml|*/yarn.lock) echo 'BLOCKED: Lock files should only change via package manager' >&2; exit 2;; esac
case "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH" in *.ts|*.tsx|*.js|*.jsx|*.mjs) cd /Users/zach/Downloads/PB-Operations-Suite && npx eslint --fix "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH" 2>/dev/null || true;; esac
afplay /System/Library/Sounds/Funk.aiff && osascript -e 'display notification "Permission needed — check terminal" with title "Claude Code" subtitle "Waiting for approval"'
afplay /System/Library/Sounds/Glass.aiff && osascript -e 'display notification "Task complete — ready for next instructions" with title "Claude Code" subtitle "Waiting for input"'
